results.title: Prisoner fanzine
results.brief_description: Prisoner packed a punch when it premiered in 1979. Set in the fictional suburb of Wentworth, the female-centred prison drama reverberated around the world, spawning international adaptations and a massive cult following.
results.description: Black and White A4 fanzine published in 1996 Issue 7 January for television series Prisoner
description_for_label: Black and White A4 fanzine published in 1996 Issue 7 January for television series Prisoner

details.label: Curatorial section
display_values: The Story of the Moving Image → Moving Australia → MA-10. Ahead of their time → MA-10-C01
